title: Tour de France : Spanish winners until 2018
summary: Miguel_Induráin_(1991_1992_1993_1994_and_1995) and Alberto_Contador_(2007_and_2009) are the most popular of all the Óscar_Pereiro_(2006) Cyclists , receiving 5 million paid Number in fiscal year 2018/19 .
This was followed 2018 France to Alberto_Contador_(2007_and_2009) during its annual summer opening .
In total , paid France to all the Óscar_Pereiro_(2006) Cyclists reached over three million .
gold: This statistic presents the list of Spanish cyclists who ever won the Tour de France until the 2018 edition . Miguel Induráin , with five consecutive victories between 1991 and 1995 , was the Spaniard who had won the French competition the most . The last Spaniard to win the Tour was Alberto Contador in 2009 .
